thumb.title: [炎上物件紹介動画。トイレ、二階和室] 地域最安値で戸建て賃貸住宅を流通させたら、価格破壊しすぎて炎上した。
thumb.description: [炎上物件紹介動画]トイレ、二階和室]地域最安値で戸建て賃貸住宅を流通させたら、価格破壊しすぎて炎上した。 北海道滝川市黄金町東４丁目6-29 （住居番号126番13の2） の戸建て賃貸住宅です。なんと月家賃３万円！ なんと、10年間住んでいただくと、土地も住宅も入居者さんに譲渡します。マイホームが欲しい方にもオススメ！https://jmty.jp/hokkaido/est-hou/article-ubdne音声、「VOICEVOX Nemo」[Video introducing a controversial property. Toilet, second-floor Japanese-style room]When we put this detached rental house on the market at the lowest price in the area, it caused a huge controversy because the price was too low. This is a detached rental house located at 6-29, Higashi 4-chome, Kogane-cho, Takikawa-shi, Hokkaido (residence number 126-13-2). The monthly rent is only 30,000 yen! What's more, if you live here for 10 years, we will transfer the land and the house to you. We recommend this property to anyone who wants to own their own home!https://jmty.jp/hokkaido/est-hou/article-ubdneVoice: ‘VOICEVOX Nemo’
